item.title: (317) trading
item.dc:creator: @Liljrbaby Liljrbaby
item.description:
@Liljrbaby wrote:

ok um here my trading code

public void declineTrade() { client other = getClient(trade_reqId); if (disconnected) { declineTrade(false); } if (!hasAccepted){ declineTrade(false); } }
yes it wield this is under it
public void debug(String text) { if (debug) sM(text); } 
public void declineTrade(boolean tellOther) {
           client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
	if (tellOther && validClient(trade_reqId)) {
		other.sM("Other player has declined the trade.");
		other.declineTrade(false);
	}</blockquote>

now this is what i need help in everytime i click decline i get dc in trade moden can anyone help me because this isa a easy way to dupeâ€¦ and i went to other TUTS and i get error everytime i change it so can anyone can help me?
